languages.text: "Ладно, к делу. "Анверы" — это сброд среди сброда, самые отбитые отморозки, каких можно найти на Футфоле, с которыми дел не хотят иметь даже другие отбитые отморозки. У них нет иерархии, своей территории — ничего. Только безымянный лидер, которого большинство анверов и в глаза не видели. Он им шлет пламенные послания в виде листовок. Одни его последователи вербуют других. Наместник пытался их приструнить, но тут как — вычистишь одну группу, а где-то в этот момент уже зародилось пять новых".

"Anyway, to the point. Those 'Anvers' are scum among scum, the most unhinged goons you can find on Footfall, and even other unhinged goons want nothing to do with them. They have no hierarchy, no territory — nothing. Only a nameless leader, who most of the Anvers haven't seen once. This leader sends them leaflets with inspiring messages. Followers are recruited by other followers. The Liege tried to bring them into line, but it's like this — you clear out one group, and in the meantime, five more spring up elsewhere."
languages.original_text: "Ладно, к делу. "Анверы" — это сброд среди сброда, самые отбитые отморозки, каких можно найти на Футфоле, с которыми дел не хотят иметь даже другие отбитые отморозки. У них нет иерархии, своей территории — ничего. Только безымянный лидер, которого большинство анверов и в глаза не видели. Он им шлет пламенные послания в виде листовок. Одни его последователи вербуют других. Наместник пытался их приструнить, но тут как — вычистишь одну группу, а где-то в этот момент уже зародилось пять новых".

traits.locale_text: "Anyway, to the point. Those 'Anvers' are scum among scum, the most unhinged goons you can find on Footfall, and even other unhinged goons want nothing to do with them. They have no hierarchy, no territory — nothing. Only a nameless leader, whom most of the Anvers haven't seen once. This leader send them leaflets with inspiring messages. Followers are recruited by other followers. The Liege tried to bring them into line, but it's like this — you clear out one group, and in the meantime, five more spring up elsewhere."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: “总之，就是，安维尔帮是人渣中的人渣，是整个落脚港最无法无天的地痞，就连别的地痞也不想和他们扯上关系。他们没有任何等级制度，也没有地盘，什么都没有。他们只有个无名领袖，而且安维尔帮绝大部分人都没见过他。这个领袖会给他们发传单，上面写着煽动性的消息。他所有的追随者都是由其他追随者负责招募的。总督本打算让这些人安分些，但事情却没这么容易。才刚清理掉了一个团伙，别的地方就又冒出了五个团伙。”
languages.original_text: "Anyway, to the point. Those 'Anvers' are scum among scum, the most unhinged goons you can find on Footfall, and even other unhinged goons want nothing to do with them. They have no hierarchy, no territory — nothing. Only a nameless leader, who most of the Anvers haven't seen once. This leader sends them leaflets with inspiring messages. Followers are recruited by other followers. The Liege tried to bring them into line, but it's like this — you clear out one group, and in the meantime, five more spring up elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: “总之，就是，安维尔帮是人渣中的人渣，是整个落脚港最无法无天的地痞，就连别的地痞也不想和他们扯上关系。他们没有任何等级制度，也没有地盘，什么都没有。他们只有个无名领袖，而且安维尔帮绝大部分人都没见过他。这个领袖会给他们发传单，上面写着煽动性的消息。他所有的追随者都是由其他追随者负责招募的。总督本打算让这些人安分些，但事情却没这么容易。才刚清理掉了一个团伙，别的地方就又冒出了五个团伙。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: «En fin, vamos al grano. Los Anvers son la mayor escoria entre la escoria, lo más rastrero que te puedes encontrar en Paso. Ni los que son como ellos quieren relacionarse con ellos. Carecen de jerarquía, de territorio; no tienen nada, solo un líder sin nombre al que la mayoría de los Anvers no ha visto nunca. Este líder les envía panfletos con mensajes inspiradores, y los seguidores reclutan a más seguidores. El señor trató de mantenerlos a raya, pero, cuando eliminas a un grupo, aparecen cinco más».
languages.original_text: "Anyway, to the point. Those 'Anvers' are scum among scum, the most unhinged goons you can find on Footfall, and even other unhinged goons want nothing to do with them. They have no hierarchy, no territory — nothing. Only a nameless leader, who most of the Anvers haven't seen once. This leader sends them leaflets with inspiring messages. Followers are recruited by other followers. The Liege tried to bring them into line, but it's like this — you clear out one group, and in the meantime, five more spring up elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: «En fin, vamos al grano. Los Anvers son la mayor escoria entre la escoria, lo más rastrero que te puedes encontrar en Paso. Ni los que son como ellos quieren relacionarse con ellos. Carecen de jerarquía, de territorio; no tienen nada, solo un líder sin nombre al que la mayoría de los Anvers no ha visto nunca. Este líder les envía panfletos con mensajes inspiradores, y los seguidores reclutan a más seguidores. El señor trató de mantenerlos a raya, pero, cuando eliminas a un grupo, aparecen cinco más».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: 「まあ、それはともかく…例の"アンヴァース"って奴らはクズ中のクズ、フットフォールでも類を見ないほど頭のネジが外れたヤバい奴らだよ。奴らには上下関係も縄張りも何もない。アンヴァースのほとんどが一度も見たことのない、名もなきリーダーだけがいる。このリーダー格の奴が、あいつらを鼓舞するメッセージが書かれたビラを配布している。新入りは他の仲間が勧誘している。リージュが奴らを殲滅させようとしたけど、ひとつの組織を一掃しても、その間に別の組織が5つくらい形成されるからいたちごっこなんだよ」
languages.original_text: "Anyway, to the point. Those 'Anvers' are scum among scum, the most unhinged goons you can find on Footfall, and even other unhinged goons want nothing to do with them. They have no hierarchy, no territory — nothing. Only a nameless leader, who most of the Anvers haven't seen once. This leader sends them leaflets with inspiring messages. Followers are recruited by other followers. The Liege tried to bring them into line, but it's like this — you clear out one group, and in the meantime, five more spring up elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、それはともかく…例の"アンヴァース"って奴らはクズ中のクズ、フットフォールでも類を見ないほど頭のネジが外れたヤバい奴らだよ。奴らには上下関係も縄張りも何もない。アンヴァースのほとんどが一度も見たことのない、名もなきリーダーだけがいる。このリーダー格の奴が、あいつらを鼓舞するメッセージが書かれたビラを配布している。新入りは他の仲間が勧誘している。リージュが奴らを殲滅させようとしたけど、ひとつの組織を一掃しても、その間に別の組織が5つくらい形成されるからいたちごっこなんだよ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: "Wie auch immer, kommen wir zum Punkt. Diese 'Anvers' sind übelster Abschaum, die hemmungslosesten Schläger, die es auf Footfall gibt, und selbst andere hemmungslose Schläger wollen nichts mit ihnen zu tun haben. Sie haben keine Hierarchie, kein Territorium – nichts. Nur einen namenlosen Anführer, den die meisten Anvers noch nie gesehen haben. Dieser Anführer schickt ihnen Handzettel mit motivierenden Botschaften. Anhänger werden von anderen Anhängern rekrutiert. Der Lehnsherr wollte sie zur Raison bringen, aber die Sache ist die – wenn Ihr gegen eine Gruppe vorgeht, gibt es plötzlich woanders fünf neue."
languages.original_text: "Anyway, to the point. Those 'Anvers' are scum among scum, the most unhinged goons you can find on Footfall, and even other unhinged goons want nothing to do with them. They have no hierarchy, no territory — nothing. Only a nameless leader, who most of the Anvers haven't seen once. This leader sends them leaflets with inspiring messages. Followers are recruited by other followers. The Liege tried to bring them into line, but it's like this — you clear out one group, and in the meantime, five more spring up elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Wie auch immer, kommen wir zum Punkt. Diese 'Anvers' sind übelster Abschaum, die hemmungslosesten Schläger, die es auf Footfall gibt, und selbst andere hemmungslose Schläger wollen nichts mit ihnen zu tun haben. Sie haben keine Hierarchie, kein Territorium – nichts. Nur einen namenlosen Anführer, den die meisten Anvers noch nie gesehen haben. Dieser Anführer schickt ihnen Handzettel mit motivierenden Botschaften. Anhänger werden von anderen Anhängern rekrutiert. Der Lehnsherr wollte sie zur Raison bringen, aber die Sache ist die – wenn Ihr gegen eine Gruppe vorgeht, gibt es plötzlich woanders fünf neue."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: « Enfin bref... Ces Anver sont la pire des vermines, les bandits les plus ravagés de tout Castel. Même les autres racailles refusent de les approcher. Ils n'ont pas de hiérarchie, pas de territoire... rien. Juste un leader sans nom, que la plupart des gars n'ont même jamais rencontré. Ce type leur envoie des brochures avec des messages d'inspiration, tandis que les membres sont recrutés par d'autres membres. Le suzerain a tenté de les mettre au pas, mais malheureusement, vous avez beau en détruire un groupe, cinq autres apparaissent ailleurs. »
languages.original_text: "Anyway, to the point. Those 'Anvers' are scum among scum, the most unhinged goons you can find on Footfall, and even other unhinged goons want nothing to do with them. They have no hierarchy, no territory — nothing. Only a nameless leader, who most of the Anvers haven't seen once. This leader sends them leaflets with inspiring messages. Followers are recruited by other followers. The Liege tried to bring them into line, but it's like this — you clear out one group, and in the meantime, five more spring up elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: « Enfin bref... Ces Anver sont la pire des vermines, les bandits les plus ravagés de tout Castel. Même les autres racailles refusent de les approcher. Ils n'ont pas de hiérarchie, pas de territoire... rien. Juste un leader sans nom, que la plupart des gars n'ont même jamais rencontré. Ce type leur envoie des brochures avec des messages d'inspiration, tandis que les membres sont recrutés par d'autres membres. Le suzerain a tenté de les mettre au pas, mais malheureusement, vous avez beau en détruire un groupe, cinq autres apparaissent ailleurs. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: "Neyse, lafı uzatmayayım. Anverlar, şerefsizlerin de şerefsizleridir. Binliman'da onlardan daha dengesiz eşkıya yoktur, hatta diğer dengesiz eşkıyalar bile onlara bulaşmak istemez. Ne hiyerarşileri var ne de bölgeleri. Sıfır. Adı sanı belirsiz bir başları var, onu da çoğu Anver görmemiştir. Bu elebaşı, onlara teşvik edici mesajlar yazan bildiriler yollar. Yeni üyeleri çeteye diğer üyeler katar. Emîr onları hizaya getirmeye çalışmışsa da vaziyet şu: Bu gruplardan birini temizlersin, başka yerde bir anda beş grup daha biter."
languages.original_text: "Anyway, to the point. Those 'Anvers' are scum among scum, the most unhinged goons you can find on Footfall, and even other unhinged goons want nothing to do with them. They have no hierarchy, no territory — nothing. Only a nameless leader, who most of the Anvers haven't seen once. This leader sends them leaflets with inspiring messages. Followers are recruited by other followers. The Liege tried to bring them into line, but it's like this — you clear out one group, and in the meantime, five more spring up elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Neyse, lafı uzatmayayım. Şu Anverlar var ya, onlardan alçağı yoktur. Binliman'da onlardan daha dengesiz eşkıya yoktur, hatta diğer dengesiz eşkıyalar bile onlara bulaşmak istemez. Ne hiyerarşileri var ne de bölgeleri... Hiçbir şeyleri yok. Liderlerinin kim olduğu meçhul, hatta Anverların çoğu bile bir kez olsun görmemiş. Lider dedikleri bu kişi, onlara teşvik edici mesajların yazdığı broşürler gönderiyor. Müritlerini yine diğer müritler topluyor. Emîr onları adam etmeye çalıştı ama durum bu şekilde... Sen bu gruplardan birini temizlerken, başka bir yerde başka beş grup birden bitiyor."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana
